responsibilities: Designed and implemented a streamlined product onboarding process for the Visa Developer Platform by developing new RESTful API endpoints and microservices. This initiative reduced the onboarding time by 10%, enhancing the efficiency and experience for clients

Automated the registration and credential acquisition process, significantly reducing manual effort and enabling a faster and more seamless onboarding experience for clients

Implemented an automated real-time compliance scan process for businesses utilizing Visa's APIs. This system ensured ongoing compliance monitoring, enabling proactive actions in case of any compliance breaches and reducing administrative manual effort by 30%

Worked closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, architects, and project managers, to coordinate API integration efforts and unify the product onboarding process across two separate platforms
Maintained comprehensive documentation and records of API integration projects, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information for future reference and knowledge sharing
Developed and documented API integration guidelines, best practices, and sample code snippets to accelerate the onboarding process and facilitate smooth integration for clients

Documented the infrastructure setup, configuration, and maintenance procedures for future reference and knowledge sharing

Implemented significant improvements to the user interaction and usability of the timeline report, resulting in an impressive 80% increase in user satisfaction

Developed a custom solution utilizing IBM WebSphere Transformation Extender (ITX/IBM WTX) and MySQL database to facilitate the tracking and submission of processed Medicare claims by providers
Worked extensively with various file formats including JSON, XML, CSV, and ANSI X12, ensuring seamless integration and data transformation between different systems

Continuously monitored system performance and implemented optimizations to enhance efficiency and scalability

Led and mentored a team of three junior professionals in the EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) managed service team, providing guidance in troubleshooting enrollment and claim process failures in a production environment

Acted as the primary point of contact for business clients, resolving critical process failures, managing day-to-day incidents, and creating break-fix service requests (SR) for prompt issue resolution

Ensured smooth production deployment by providing release support and conducting production checkouts to validate the stability and integrity of the implemented solutions
Actively monitored and resolved issues during production deployments, minimizing downtime and ensuring uninterrupted business operations
